title: Implement advanced indexing (and mixed basic/advanced)
body_html:
NumPy style advanced indexing is documented here http://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy/reference/arrays.indexing.html#advanced-indexing

We currently support basic indexing http://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy/reference/arrays.indexing.html#basic-slicing-and-indexing
using StridedSlice.

e.g.

foo = Some tensor
idx1=[1,2,3]
idx2=[3,4,5]
foo[idx1, idx2, 3]
body_text:
NumPy style advanced indexing is documented here http://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy/reference/arrays.indexing.html#advanced-indexing
We currently support basic indexing http://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy/reference/arrays.indexing.html#basic-slicing-and-indexing
using StridedSlice.
e.g.

idx1=[1,2,3]
idx2=[3,4,5]
foo[idx1, idx2, 3]
body:
NumPy style advanced indexing is documented here http://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy/reference/arrays.indexing.html#advanced-indexing

We currently support basic indexing http://docs.scipy.org/doc/numpy/reference/arrays.indexing.html#basic-slicing-and-indexing
using StridedSlice.

e.g.

foo = Some tensor
idx1=[1,2,3]
idx2=[3,4,5]
foo[idx1, idx2, 3]
